analysis.key_quote: Turning the civil service into At-will employment subject to loyalty tests will drive away high performing employees and replace them with the type of incompetent and corrupt DOGE hires that are destroying the government as of this comment.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the loss of high-performing employees and the potential for corruption, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
